name: vanilla-test
description: minimal test framework for node, browsers, and electron, anywhere javascript can run

scripts.emulate:
echo COPY AND RUN THESE:

cp ./* ./example/node_modules/vanilla-test/ -Force

cp ./node_modules/strong-type/* ./example/node_modules/strong-type/ -Force

cp ./node_modules/ansi-colors-es6/* ./example/node_modules/ansi-colors-es6/ -Force

author: Brandon Nozaki Miller
